channel.title: Need help can't log on any servers
channel.description: i have tried at least several different servers and i check the server online list they were all online,but they all say the same thing when i try to log on, "Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click cancel then start server to make your own.please help. :confused: :confused:

item.title: Need help can't log on any servers
item.dc:creator: @rsplayer100 rsplayer100
item.description:
@rsplayer100 wrote:

The following instructions are so easy your bunny can read it! O.o

First go to “file” on your server/webclient and click “new port” and type in the port=[b]the following instructions are in bytecode(so your computer can read it lol)
0001 1010 0101 1011
0010 0110 0111 1101
Lol!
[b]The following instructions are in Dog language lol[b]
Bark bark woof whine woof
bark woof bark bark woof
Bark bark woof whine bark
[b]lol[b]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help can't log on any servers
item.dc:creator: @Jordanz_Pk Jordanz Pk
item.description:
@Jordanz_Pk wrote:

Mabye you have the wrong port?

Well sometimes the servers go down and it’s still on the server list because it updates every 20 minutes so… It will come off the serverstatus if it stays off in how ever many minutes are left 'til update.

Read full topic
